info.description: Enquiry for Guarantee expiring for the client
info.title: getExpiringGuarantees

parameters.name: maturityDate
parameters.description: The delivery period or maturity date of the contract transacted

parameters.name: gteeReturnDate
parameters.description: Date on which the original Guarantee will be returned by the customer to the Bank that issued it

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expacted to get as part of reponse from t24 on every enquiry request.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expacted to get as part of reponse from t24 on every enquiry request

guaranteeType.description: Refers to the type of the contract that is being issued

issueDate.description: The date the item was issued.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as a credit facility or limit is due to expire

maturityDate.description: The delivery period or maturity date of the contract transacted

autoExpiry.description: Decision field to determine whether the contingent entries are to be reversed after the deal expiry date or not

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
